summary: THE VAN SHUT OFF WHILE DRIVING OVER A DOZEN TIMES IN THE PAST 3 WEEKS. IT ONLY OCCURS WHILE DRIVING IN SLOW SPEEDS AND HAPPENS WHEN FIRST STARTING THE VAN AND WHILE PARKING. THE ENTIRE CAR SHUTS OFF AND I LOSE POWER STEERING AND THE VAN GOES DEAD. MECHANIC CANNOT REPLICATE PROBLEM. MAINTENANCE IS SCHEDULED REGULARLY AND GAS IS ALWAYS AT A HALF A TANK.  *TR
